title: Bombshell Brides: The Complete Collection
description:
A Vegas wedding and a kingpin chasing his bride.

A scarred lighthouse keeper and a secret twin swap…


This collection contains four bombshell brides and their hot, possessive grooms. RSVP yes and read on for…


Woke Up Wed

My boss can barely stand five minutes with me.But I wake up wearing his ring.
Runaway Bride

Yesterday I was a mafia princess, powerful and beloved.Today I’m crawling through a bathroom window in a wedding gown.
Mail Order Vow

We meet for the first time on a windswept cliff at 8am.In twenty-four hours, we’ll marry.
Fake Fiance

The prince will announce his engagement at the ball tonight.But it’s not his fiance on his arm–it’s me. Her twin sister.
author: Cassie Mint
